[VPSCreed](http://www.vpscreed.com/) is an industry leader when it comes to reliable and high-performance Virtual Private servers at the most affordable prices. Check out our High Performance KVM Product Line at the most affordable price. (Amazing 50% Discount for a Limited Time only)

**COUPON CODE - 0LY4LDS7EK (For Managed Linux VPS), KVMPRO50 (For KVM)**

What's more? Our VPS packages come with a full management contract. Extra Dedicated Ram Powered by 16 to 24 Core Processors Never Oversold (Low Density Per Node) Free Remote FTP Backup Vault on Request with file-manager. 99.99% Uptime Guaranteed.

**LIFETIME ADDON OFFER**: Remote FTP storage of 5GB on request

================================

**Managed Linux VPS Plan**

Level-0 Disk Space : 40 GB Dedicated Ram : 1 GB CPU Allocation : 2x2.67GHz Bandwidth : 500 GB Discounted Price : $5.5/mo [ORDER LINK](http://www.vpscreed.com/budget_vps_hosting.php)

======================================

**KVM PLAN**

KVM L-1 256 MB RAM 10 GB Storage 1 x 2.7 GHz CPU 150 GB Monthly Traffic Price after discount : $5.49/mo [Order Link](http://www.vpscreed.com/kvm_managed_vps_hosting.php)

======================================

All plans include: Instant VPS Setup on Payment Extra IPs Available Full Root Access Choice of multiple Linux Flavors Windows OS available for KVM Line Unlimited OS Reloads & Reboots SolusVM Control Panel TUN/TAP Free management contract 99.99% Uptime Guaranteed Secondary Disks in KVM Line Remote VNC
